roster.name: fking hl mains
roster.description:
The team page is a jest, our actual roster runs: 

CS: Exquizit
FS: Ages
Demo: Silent
Medic: Kai
Pocket: Bree
Roamer: Hecate

Subs: SpiderFast/Darien, Mad-Dutchman69 

Exquizit has been providing maincalls from combo scout, and we are hoping to keep him on this class as without him we have little direction and 4/6 of our players have 6's playtime between minimal and limited. We've scrimmed Wasteman's team and been rolled (different rosters) and scrimmed Aspect and either 0-0'd or lost 0-3. Desperately hoping for the lowest div so we have a less stressful environment in which to learn the gamemode; After losing to Wasteman some players threatened to leave if we had to play in main. Happy to elaborate via Discord RToC#8315

players.name: MAD-dutchman69
players.description: pretty new to comp and i want to improve my skills im very exited to try it out

--- ### Match Details This match is to be played during the Round 1 dates found within the [Key Dates](https://ozfortress.com/forums/threads/1165) page, which is also linked as a button above. > Disclaimer: We are no longer putting the specific Round dates in each match thread to minimize the amount of repetition during match generation, and we feel most players know by now what the match days are. --- ### Reminders - During Sixes Season 37 we plan on conducting random demo checks to ensure players are recording POV demos. Please ensure that you are recording match demos in order to avoid punishment. - If you are unsure of whether or not something is considered a game exploit, contact a League Administrator for clarification. Ignorance is not an excuse.
